Item.Name: CallWebservice
Item.Description: A Web Service is a method of communication between two electronic devices over http. You can use a Web Service to pull in some information generated by another application onto a Stadium page

Item.Name: Decision
Item.Description: Decisions allow for the definition of conditional statements. On the page, these statements will execute some functionality according to a specific condition.

Item.Name: ExecuteSQL
Item.Description: ExecuteSQL allows the application to connect to MSSQL or Oracle databases and execute a SQL statement. When using MSSQL you can also run stored procedures.

Item.Name: ForEach
Item.Description: Loop through a comma separated list of values and for each value do a certain action.

Item.Name: GetFile
Item.Description: The component will fetch a file from the server and request the user to download it.

Item.Name: MessageBox
Item.Description: The component uses a JQuery dialog window to display some information or request a decision from a user.

Item.Name: NavigateToPage
Item.Description: You can use this component to navigate the user away from a page and onto another one.

Item.Name: Notification
Item.Description: You can use this component to display a notification to the user.

Item.Name: SetOutputParameter
Item.Description: Output parameters are placeholders for values the script will return when finished. Use SetOutputParameter to define the value of a script output parameter.

Item.Name: SetValue
Item.Description: SetValue is used for setting the values of the various script elements.

Item.Name: SetVariable
Item.Description: Variables are placeholders for values inside a script. Use SetVariable to define the value of a script variable.

Item.Name: Variable
Item.Description: Variables are placeholders for values inside a script. They can be initialised with a value or set using the SetValue action.
